it.introText: â€œSono stati i Romani a dettare l'usanza delle fedi nuziali poste allâ€™anulare sinistro: si riteneva che la "vena amoris" passasse direttamente per questo dito, per poi arrivare al cuoreâ€
it.invitoText: Con immenso piacere siamo lieti di invitarvi al nostro matrimonio
it.footerText: La vostra presenza renderÃ  indimenticabile questo giorno.

en.introText: â€œIt was the Romans who established the tradition of wearing wedding rings on the left ring finger: they believed that the "vena amoris" ran directly through this finger and led straight to the heartâ€
en.invitoText: We are delighted to invite you to our wedding
en.footerText: Your presence will make this day unforgettable.

whatsapp.question: Will you attend?
whatsapp.yesMessage:
Thanks for the invite, and congratulations on your wedding!
Yes, Iâ€™ll be there! ğŸ¥³
whatsapp.noMessage:

Iâ€™m really sorry, but I wonâ€™t be able to make it. ğŸ˜
